definition: to stand/to set up/to establish/to lay down/to draw up/at once/immediately

sentences.english: Both attended private schools and pursued their respective passions.
sentences.chinese: 他们都进私立学校，并追求自己的理想。

sentences.english: She worked in the kitchen of a private school.
sentences.chinese: 过去他曾在一家私立学校的厨房工作。

sentences.english: Are there any differences between public and private schools?
sentences.chinese: 公立学校和私立学校有什么不同吗？

sentences.english: Brigham Young University is a private school.
sentences.chinese: 杨白翰大学是一所私立学校。

sentences.english: The courses established by the private-operated schools emphasized real learning and had full styles.
sentences.chinese: 私立学校开设的课程其内容强调实学，且风格各具。

sentences.english: some private schools down the area, they have a really strict uniform.
sentences.chinese: 在这里有的私立学校，他们对校服要求很严。

sentences.english: The second chapter introduces the legal foundation of the non-government running school's legal system.
sentences.chinese: 第二章主要介绍了私立学校法律制度的法理基础。

sentences.english: The study was done at a fee-paying school in Rhode Island, USA.
sentences.chinese: 这项研究是在美国罗德岛州的一所私立学校里完成的。

sentences.english: Meek is the principal of Geelong Grammar School (GGS), one of the best private schools in Australia.
sentences.chinese: 基隆文法学校是澳大利亚最好的私立学校之一。

sentences.english: The 10 schools that performed best in our survey are all private schools.
sentences.chinese: 本次调查中表现最好的10所学校都是私立学校。

sentences.english: Hornberg had been put in charge by the Russians of the private schools of Warsaw.
sentences.chinese: 角页岩曾经被华沙私立学校的俄罗斯人所控制。

sentences.english: I will teach Japanese in a private school.
sentences.chinese: 我将在一所私立学校教日语。

sentences.english: I thought Ivy League schools are all private schools.
sentences.chinese: 我好像听说常春藤盟校都是私立学校。

sentences.english: Yang Education Centre is a private school in Singapore specializing in Chinese Language.
sentences.chinese: 杨老师教育中心是一所专门教授华文的私立学校。

sentences.english: We’re like to send our daughter to a private school.
sentences.chinese: 我们想把我们的女儿送到私立学校去。

sentences.english: I teach in the private sector.
sentences.chinese: 我在一个私立学校教书。

definition: run by the local people/privately operated
the Great Learning, one of the Four Books 四書|四书[Si4 shu1] in Confucianism
to attend school as a day student
